function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of copper touch surfaces in existing buildings","Impact":"Spread of coronavirus","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning of surfaces, use of antimicrobial coatings, awareness training for occupants","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, cold spray technology","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance"},{"Description":"Expensive cost of copper material and maintenance","Impact":"Financial burden, reduced implementation","Mitigation":"Exploring cost-effective alternatives, implementing cold spray technology, seeking funding support","Technologies":"Cold spray technology, cost-effective maintenance solutions","People":"Building owners, facility managers, financial stakeholders","Owner":"Building owners, financial stakeholders"},{"Description":"Need for more research on indoor plant requirements","Impact":"Uncertainty in effectiveness, inadequate air purification","Mitigation":"Conducting further research, setting industry standards, collaboration with indoor plant experts","Technologies":"Indoor plant research, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Building designers, indoor plant experts, building occupants","Owner":"Building designers, research institutions"},{"Description":"Use of antimicrobial paint on surfaces","Impact":"Ineffective virus and bacteria destruction, false sense of security","Mitigation":"Regular testing of paint effectiveness, combination with other mitigation measures, occupant education on paint limitations","Technologies":"Antimicrobial paint testing, combination with other mitigation measures, occupant education","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance"}]}
